title: Set up project repo
description: Create a GitHub repository for TOMDO and push initial files.

title: Design Kanban layout
description: Decide on the UI/UX for the board, columns, and cards.

title: Build drag-and-drop
description: Implement smooth drag-and-drop for tasks between columns.

title: Implement search filter
description: Add search functionality to filter tasks by title, description, or tags.

title: Deploy to GitHub Pages
description: Host the TOMDO web app on GitHub Pages for free public access.
